mapper.insert: insert into reply ( reply_bbs_key, reply_writer, reply_contents, reply_lock, reply_reaction) value ( #{reply_bbs_key}, #{reply_writer}, #{reply_contents}, #{reply_lock}, #{reply_reaction})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_contents=#{reply_contents} where reply_key=#{reply_key}
update reply set reply_lock=#{reply_lock} where reply_key=#{reply_key}
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from reply where reply_bbs_key=#{reply_bbs_key} ;
